greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of the FP2 polynomials of A156925.
comment: |a(n)| is the 2^n times the determinant of the n X n matrix whose element (i,j) equals i^j. - _Michel Lagneau_, Feb 08 2021
formula: Row sum(n+1) = (-1)^(n)*2*(n+1)!*Row sum(n) with Row sum(n=0) = 1.
Let A(x)=sum(k>=0, |a(k)|*x^k  ), then A(x)= G(0)/2, where G(k)= 1  + 1/(1 - 2*x*(k+1)!/(2*x*(k+1)! + 1/G(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jul 10 2013
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Feb 20 2009
